participant_1.name: George
participant_1.personality: Caring and hardworking, always focused on his bees and the environment.
participant_1.background: i am a bee farmer. i have zero family that i'm close to. my name is george. my favorite food is papaya.

participant_2.name: Edith
participant_2.personality: Vivacious and spirited, with a zest for life despite her age.
participant_2.background: i feel like i might live forever. i am 100 years old. i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight. i remember when nobody had a television. i am very strong for my age.

content.text: I am tired. I have been working all day what are you up to?
Nothing i just see my farms
I'm currently working on my garden.
